name: Hide and Seek (itch) (Art of Nyxi)
description:
Hide and Seek

Based on the urban legend ritual 'One Man Hide and Seek' or 'Hide and Seek Alone'. Also found on Creepypasta and /r/nosleep.

There's nothing better than pizza and a movie after a long hard day.
You find a new horror movie that you haven't seen yet, do you invite a friend over or do you brave it alone? A storm blows a fuse in the basement, do you fix it? You find instructions for a curious game, do you play? 
Choose your path wisely.

Features

• A Choose-Your-Own-Adventure game.
• Interactive horror and suspense.
• Creepy atmospheric audio.
• Monochromatic sketch art style.
• 17 Ending Variations.

Controls:

Up and down arrow keys move between options.
Space selects highlighted text.
Enter submits typed text.
Escape exits the game.

Warning:
This game contains some flashing effects. Viewer discretion is advised for people with photosensitivity. 
Not intended for younger audiences.

Author's Note
This is my first fully completed and released game, I've done my best to test it completely, however, if you find a bug please let me know in the comments below.
